General.Name: Heilongjiang Agriculture Co Ltd
General.Description: Heilongjiang Agriculture Company Limited engages in production and sale of agricultural products in China and internationally. The company offers rice, corn, soyabean, and other agricultural products; oilseeds; livestock breeding services; and agricultural technology development services. It also provides information processing and storage support services, as well as technology consultation and transfer, and technical services. In addition, the company is involved in the contracting of cultivated land; manufacture and sale of fertilizers; real estate development and operation; and provision of warehousing services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Harbin, China. Heilongjiang Agriculture Company Limited is a subsidiary of Beidahuang Land Reclamation Group Co., Ltd.
